meanings.definition: A collective farm in the former Soviet Union.
meanings.sent1: The kolkhos provided a way for farmers to work together.
meanings.sent2: The villagers joined the kolkhos to cultivate the land collectively.
meanings.sent3: The kolkhos was like a big family farm where everyone pitched in.
meanings.sent4: In the kolkhos, the fields were a shared canvas painted by many hands.
meanings.sent5: The kolkhos buzzed with activity as the community tended to the crops.

meanings.definition: A type of agricultural cooperative in Russia and other former Soviet republics.
meanings.sent1: The kolkhos members pooled their resources for better farming.
meanings.sent2: The kolkhos was a cooperative effort to improve agricultural practices.
meanings.sent3: Joining the kolkhos meant being part of a farming team.
meanings.sent4: The kolkhos symbolized unity in working towards a common goal.
meanings.sent5: The kolkhos thrived on collaboration among its members.
